name: Lipstick Magazine "Skin Deep" Mens and Ladies Short Sleeve Tee Shirts
description: Mens and Womens Gildan Heavy Cotton 100% cotton Short Sleeve Tee Shirts with the "Skin Deep" album cover on the front and the new Lipstick Magazine Logo and websites on the back

name: SKIN DEEP
description: Finally a savior for rock n roll , Lipstick Magazine a powerful female fronted rock band!!!! Soul scratching, heart pounding, rock n roll in it's purest form. The band is fronted by powerhouse vocalist Toni Loyas. Damon Marks and Nat Gardiner provide a compelling guitar sound which sustains from song to song. David Loyas provides the melodic center and colors the driven riffs. The heart beat and pulse is provided by Russ and Mike the rythmic core of Lipstick Magazine. "Skin Deep" fires up a pulsing glam-rock groove, built on a familiarly satisfying foundation of electric blues.
